title: (x) 3 in PDF - John Handy, Binary, ??? {Chesh, David H}
content: The first one is [John Handy](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/john-handy/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=72&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=Ombres+et+lumieres). Thanks to Mike's ID guide for the assist.
author: cheshiredave

comments.content:
The 2nd one ( Typo 2 ) would be ' [Binary](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/binary-light/)'..   
_( Rotis' long lost sibling, or 'brother from a different mother'.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053154im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Yesyes.. )_
